entries.title: Leaked press renders of the Galaxy S23 series colors show green, pink, and more
entries.description: Samsung appears to be going with an "all muted, all the time" strategy this year.

entries.title: The Pixel’s January software update has broken auto Bluetooth pairing for some
entries.description: The issue appears to be affecting Bluetooth pairing on a number of vehicles.

entries.title: You told us: You want these two smartphone camera improvements in 2023
entries.description: It turns out that polled Android Authority readers want better zoom and low-light image quality in 2023.

entries.title: Motorola could beat rivals to the punch with two-way satellite messaging
entries.description: Two-way satellite texting is coming to smartphones later this quarter, and Motorola is getting in on the action.

entries.title: Snapdragon Satellite for Android is Qualcomm’s answer to Apple’s Emergency SOS
entries.description: The tech supports two-way satellite-based messaging for premium Android phones.

entries.title: These AirPods Pro memory foam tips promise a better fit than the originals
entries.description: These ear tips conform to the ear of the AirPods Pro owner.

entries.title: CES 2023 Android announcements: New Android Auto is here for all, more
entries.description: From listening to music to driving in your car, Android has a lot of new tricks up its sleeve.

entries.title: Razer reveals the release date for the Razer Edge and Razer Edge 5G
entries.description: Both versions of the Razer Edge will be available in the next few weeks.

entries.title: HTC Vive XR Elite announced: A cheaper Meta Quest Pro rival
entries.description: The headset also comes with a battery strap, 4K resolution, and plenty more features.

entries.title: Razer goes big, announces the Razer Blade 16 and 18
entries.description: The Razer Blade 16 and 18 are expected to release sometime in early 2023.

entries.title: Lenovo ThinkPhone hands-on: The business phone you might actually buy
entries.description: Is it the Motorola flagship of our dreams? Technically, no, but also yes.

entries.title: Amazon announces Matter-over-Thread is coming to Echo devices this spring
entries.description: Amazon is also updating its Alexa app for Matter support.

entries.title: The Lenovo Tab Extreme tablet has a huge screen, and an equally huge price
entries.description: The 14.5-inch display is certainly on the large side of tablet screen sizes.

entries.title: Dual-screen laptop with a color e-ink display? Meet the ThinkPad Plus Twist
entries.description: The Twist plays double duty: on one side you get a normal OLED display, on the other you get a color e-ink.

entries.title: This upcoming smartphone will hit the limit of USB-C charging speeds
entries.description: 240W charging is coming to a phone next month, hitting the official limit of charging speeds over USB-C

entries.title: Yeelight Cube is a cool new stackable Matter-powered smart lighting device
entries.description: There are three variants in the line and they are all stackable, creating endless possibilities for your desk.

entries.title: Ring announces Car Cam to give your car more security
entries.description: Ring's Car Cam is expected to launch in February.

entries.title: Sony PSVR 2 hands-on: A massive jump forward from the original
entries.description: A huge upgrade from the PSVR in every way that matters.

entries.title: Daily Authority: 📱 A high RISC move for Android?
entries.description: Highlights include Android's RISC-V support, a crazy darts finish going viral, and loads of CES stories.

entries.title: Asus’ new Xbox controller rocks an OLED display and tri-mode connectivity
entries.description: It's the first licensed Xbox controller to include connectivity via Bluetooth, RF, and USB-C.

entries.title: Plex Discover will exit beta in Q1 2023
entries.description: Get ready for Plex to get more powerful.

entries.title: AMD announces Ryzen 7040 series processors with on-chip AI
entries.description: Processors with intelligence.

entries.title: Project Leonardo is a very different PS5 controller for gamers with disabilities
entries.description: This could be a true game changer for many players.

entries.title: PS2 emulator for Android AetherSX2 ceases development due to ‘death threats’
entries.description: The developer simply wasn't having fun anymore.
